# Frontend Templates

Code templates for React + Vite + TanStack applications.

| Template | Usage |
|----------|-------|
| [_template_feature_component.md](./_template_feature_component.md) | Smart components with data fetching |
| [_template_ui_component.md](./_template_ui_component.md) | Presentational components with CVA |
| [_template_hook.md](./_template_hook.md) | Custom React hooks |
| [_template_page.md](./_template_page.md) | TanStack Router pages |
| [_template_ladle_story.md](./_template_ladle_story.md) | Ladle component stories |
| [_template_vitest.md](./_template_vitest.md) | Vitest + RTL tests |
